frontmatter.title: Prioritising as a team
frontmatter.description: Your whole team should be involved in prioritisation of their work. Providing their knowledge as input directly, and empowering them to decide on their own work produces better software and better teams

frontmatter.title: Funding service teams rather than projects
frontmatter.description: Part 2 of service teams rather than project teams, this time with the practicalities of how to govern their spend
